channel.title: [Added] Updates to the FlowType codelist
channel.description:
I’ve sent [a pull request](https://github.com/IATI/IATI-Codelists-NonEmbedded/pull/151) to bring the [FlowType codelist](http://iatistandard.org/202/codelists/FlowType/) in line with that published by the [OECD DAC](http://www.oecd.org/dac/stats/dacandcrscodelists.htm).
A summary of changes is as follows:
Codes added:
* `21` Non-export credit OOF * `22` Officially supported export credits * `36` Private Foreign Direct Investment * `37` Other Private flows at market terms
Codes withdrawn:
* `20` OOF (I’m not exactly sure when… Between 2017-03-14 and 2017-03-17. This was before [this scraper](https://morph.io/andylolz/dac-crs-codes) was running daily.)
Codes modified:
* `35`: Name changed from ‘Private Market’ to ‘Private market’

item.title: [Added] Updates to the FlowType codelist
item.dc:creator: hayfield
item.description:
The Pull Request referenced in the first post of this topic has now been merged.

The values will appear on the website when it is next generated (should be later today).

As such, I have marked this topic as [Added].

Read full topic

item.title: [Added] Updates to the FlowType codelist
item.dc:creator: IATI-techteam
item.description:
The IATI tech team have reviewed and approved this pull request. We expect changes to be implemented by 9th June.

Read full topic

item.title: [Added] Updates to the FlowType codelist
item.dc:creator: andylolz
item.description:
I’ve sent a pull request to bring the FlowType codelist in line with that published by the OECD DAC.

A summary of changes is as follows:

Codes added:

  • 21 Non-export credit OOF
  • 22 Officially supported export credits
  • 36 Private Foreign Direct Investment
  • 37 Other Private flows at market terms

Codes withdrawn:

  • 20 OOF (I’m not exactly sure when… Between 2017-03-14 and 2017-03-17. This was before this scraper was running daily.)

Codes modified:

  • 35: Name changed from ‘Private Market’ to ‘Private market’

Read full topic
